TownHall.building_Info: This is the Town Hall. The current mayor can start votes and make disisions here
TownHall.building_Disc: From the outside the building is very large and looks sturdy able to hold all the villagers incase of a garrison. As you enter there is a woman sitting at the desk with pointed glasses She asks you Can i help you?

MarketPlace.building_Info: This is where you go to buy and sell stuff.
MarketPlace.building_Disc: There are a few building with signs above the doors on what they sell.

Blacksmith.building_Info: This is where you go to buy and sell basic weapons.
Blacksmith.building_Disc: The sign above this building is a hammer above an anvil. Inside the wall is lined with diffrent swords and shilds and other equipment.

Apothary.building_Info: This is where you go to buy and sell Potions and ingredients.
Apothary.building_Disc: The sign above this building is a potion. Inside there are couldrens bubboling a boiling there is an old woman sturing.

Arcana.building_Info: This is where you go to buy and sell Arcana items.
Arcana.building_Disc: The sign above this building is a mage staff. Inside there are rows of books and trinkets used for spells.

Tavern.building_Info: This is where you go to buy food and drink till you drop but dont worry there are beds too incase you want to sleep.
Tavern.building_Disc: As you approch the building all you hear is loud chatter and the chering sound of music and people dancing. the smell of alcahol courses through the air.

Gate.building_Info: Go here to enter and exit the town.
Gate.building_Disc: The Gate towers over you at least four men at the foot of the gate and several on top.

Fountain.building_Info: You can drink from it or make a wish.
Fountain.building_Disc: There are buildings in a square all arround the fountain. You see the glittering coins at the bottom of the fountain

TIMS.building_Info: Sell all items here but you wont get as much as you might like from it but the town will benifit greatly.
TIMS.building_Disc: There are many people rushing about the large building very plain looking with large amounts of items just stock piled ready to be sold to the traders
